subject: Good Experience
body: Just wanted to say Shoppy is great. The delivery was fast and the UI is smooth.

subject: Refund Delay
body: I am using Shoppy on a Samsung Galaxy S22 running Android 14. The app crashes when I proceed to payment. Steps to reproduce: add item to cart, checkout.

subject: Suggestion for Improvement
body: Just wanted to say Shoppy is great. The delivery was fast and the UI is smooth.

subject: General Feedback
body: Hi, I would like to suggest adding a wishlist feature in Shoppy. It would improve the shopping experience a lot.
